content:
Schwartzbaum family

1 Lazar SCHWARTZBAUM
 + Pesla 
  2x Sussel SCHWARTZBAUM             1804-06 - 1849 #226
    + Ester Malka KAUFLER            1814 - Jul 30, 1873 #434 (Jakob)
     3o Reisel SCHWARTZBAUM          1834 #315 - 1834 #149
     3o Sara Rywka SCHWARTZBAUM      1835 #120 - after 1900
       * Hersch Jozef GOLDSCHNEIDER  1836 #497 - 1880-1900
             married May 19, 1881 #36
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Lazar SCHWARTZBAUM           1836 #390 - before 1880

    ??    * Nusen /Salomon LASZKIEWICZ  1853/54 Mielca
    ??          married Jan 25, 1880 #6

    ??     5x Jozef LASZKIEWICZ      Jun 28, 1883 #405
    ??     5o Feigel LASZKIEWICZ     Apr 1, 1885 #161

    ??             married Apr 30, 1908 #115
    ??           FAMILY LISTING
    ??     5o Paulina LASZKIEWICZ    Sep 23, 1886 #617

    ??     5x Leizer/Leon LASZKIEWICZ  Jan 12, 1893 #54
     3o Itel SCHWARTZBAUM            Oct 31, 1838 (1839 #106)

     3x Jakob Hirsz SCHWARTZBAUM     1843 #169 - 1846 #454
